headline: Did Exelon's (EXC) New Grid Plan and Tech Leadership Shift Its Regulated Growth Narrative?
summary: Exelon recently announced that Tim Peterson, currently chief information and technology officer at Xcel Energy, will join as executive vice president and chief customer and technology officer in February 2026, leading an integrated organization that aligns customer strategy with information technology across more than 10.7 million utility customers. At the same time, Exelonâ€™s ComEd unit has introduced long-term Transmission Security Agreements and a new multi-year grid plan that aim to...
